Content:: The Minister of Education[2] (Sinhala: අධ්‍යාපන අමාත්‍ය; Tamil: கல்வி அமைச்சர்) is an appointment in the Cabinet of Sri Lanka. Sri Lanka Freedom Party United National Party Sinhala Language Front Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna Mahajana Eksath Peramuna [5]
